mapper.insert: insert into patent_list values( patent_code_seq.nextval, #{user_id}, nvl(#{patent_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, null), nvl(#{nation, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, null), nvl(#{patent_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, null), nvl(#{inventer, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, null), nvl(#{patent_date, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, null), nvl(#{patent_url, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, null), nvl(#{contents, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, null) )
mapper.select: select patent_code, user_id, patent_name, nation, patent_no, inventer, patent_date, patent_url, contents from patent_list where user_id = #{user_id} order by patent_date desc
